title: Introduction to amapro
text: AMap’s documentation Chinese links make reference . happen know Chinese, convenient set browser auto-translate. help little lot depending website/page structure. One can also copy/paste text Google translate.

title: Introduction to amapro
text: Install amapro Github withremotes::install_github("helgasoft/amapro") CRAN version also available usually outdated. Run following commands library(amapro); .init()  pop-dialog ask API key (shows , repeated).  API key obtained registration, expecting provide Chinese phone number SMS verification.  get API key reside China? ask friend China help, hire local freelancer search web shared key use temporary Chinese phone number sites like sms24., turtle-sms.xyz, etc. However probably blacklisted registration page shows ‘already registered’. select temporarily ‘demo’ option, without guarantee work long run

title: Introduction to amapro
text: Interactive, hands-showcase many library features. Activate following command: library(amapro); demo(.shiny)

title: Introduction to amapro
text: amapro based version 2.0 AMap (JSAPI v2.0). “API” auto-translates “Reference book” web menus.

title: Introduction to amapro
text: base library optional plugins. important links Summary Guide API documentation, good auto-translation Examples - live demos Forum - reported issues

title: Introduction to amapro
text: AMap extension enhanced 3D features. amapro invoked parameter - .init(loca=TRUE, ...). documentation auto-translates well browser. Intro API documentation

title: Introduction to amapro
text: Controlling map elements done sending AMap commands . Commands can chained pipe operator |> %>% executed sequentially order received.  Example: .cmd('setAngle', 'carIcon', -90) amapro uses native AMap commands introduces additional: name: add new global JS object outside map .cmd('set', 'VectorLayer', name='e$layer1') without name: add new element map .cmd('set', 'e$marker1', position= c(116.478, 39.998)) addTo - append one existing JS object another name .cmd('addTo', 'e$layer1', 'e$marker1') var - set JavaScript variable .cmd('var', 'e$myOpacity', 0.8) code - execute JavaScript code .cmd('code', 'alert("JS");') AMap commands starting get return data map related objects.  Put data Shiny input variable setting name parameter r.  Example: .cmd('getCenter', 'map', r='inShiny1')  command update input$inShiny1 Lng/Lat coordinates map center.

title: Introduction to amapro
text: Events defined map elements. types instances use /methods bind remove events.  Events set attribute () list lists. event separate list event name e, JS function f optionally query q. Example: /events without name ignored, except map (example).  JavaScript function Shiny.setInputValue() can used send data back Shiny.
code: am.init(center= c(116.475, 39.997), zoom= 17,         on= list(list(e= 'complete',                        f= "function() {alert('loaded!');}")) )

title: Introduction to amapro
text: one map created .init per session. JS global called ‘m$jmap’. AMap command addTo overwritten amapro used. supported AMap plugins : ControlBar, Scale, ToolBar, MoveAnimation, MouseTool, HeatMap, GeoJSON, ElasticMarker. built-AMap tile layers (Satellite, Traffic, Roads) limited China . However, command .item(‘TileLayer’), one can use Leaflet provider worldwide coverage. AMap built-map layers GCJ-02 coded coordinates collected display incorrectly Leaflet WGS-84 based maps, vice-versa. need converted. Conversion available function convertFrom. AMap ecosystem vast, unsupported features include: ‘BesizerCurve’, ‘MarkerCluster’, ‘HawkEye’, IndoorMap, CustomLayer, ‘GLCustomLayer’, ‘DistrictLayer’, ‘LayerGroup’, editors like ‘PolygonEditor’,‘Webservice’, ‘Search(AMap.Autocomplete, AMap.PlaceSearch)’, ‘Geocoding(AMap.Geocoder)’, Route planning, services(weather, districts, etc.), positioning, utilities. Loca elements supported, tested. Latest AmbientLight, DirectionalLight PointLight objects supported, parameters ambLight, dirLight pointLight accomplish . Loca events supported yet. loca.js file several versions, latest (bigger) one work well current amap.js

title: Introduction to amapro
text: named objects created JS global variables (window.name). Good practice use name prefix (m$) avoid overwriting accidentally external variables. API attributes set JS function instead value. Function defined string starting word “function”. usually WMS/WMTS tiles come external servers may present CORS problem - browser refusal load. One can install small extension Chrome Firefox fix problem manually inside browser. AMap several predefined Map styles. set map options mapStyle. amapro silent errors collected browser Console. Press key F12 open dev.environment, open tab “Console” view . Chrome/Firefox extensions may interfere map presentation (like ‘uBlock’)

title: Authors and Citation
text: Larry Helgason. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Helgason L (2022). amapro: Thin Wrapper Mapping Library 'AMap' 'AutoNavi'. https://github.com/helgasoft/amapro/, https://helgasoft.github.io/amapro/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {amapro: Thin Wrapper for Mapping Library 'AMap' by 'AutoNavi'},   author = {Larry Helgason},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/helgasoft/amapro/, https://helgasoft.github.io/amapro/}, }

what: Thin Wrapper for Mapping Library AMap by AutoNavi
title: Thin Wrapper for Mapping Library AMap by AutoNavi
text: thin R wrapper around Javascript library AMap 3D plugin Loca. API eight(8) commands enclose AMap Loca v.2.0 native commands parameters. Features easy transition 2D /3D, variety markers layers, geoJson import, map manual drawing, dynamic 3D effects like flyover trace animation, .  Enjoy rich interactive maps R Shiny minimal overhead!

title: Thin Wrapper for Mapping Library AMap by AutoNavi
text: Use latest development version optimal experience:

title: Thin Wrapper for Mapping Library AMap by AutoNavi
Thin Wrapper for Mapping Library AMap by AutoNavi
code: ctr <- c(22.430151, 37.073011) turl <- paste0('http://server.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/',                  'World_Imagery/MapServer/tile/[z]/[y]/[x]') helmet <- 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/9d/Ancient_Greek_helmet.png'  library(amapro) am.init(viewMode= '3D', center= ctr, zoom= 10, pitch= 60) |> am.control(ctype= 'ControlBar', position= 'RT') |> am.item('TileLayer', tileUrl= turl) |> am.item('Marker', position= ctr, icon= helmet) |> am.cmd('set', 'InfoWindow', name='iwin', content='This is Sparta') |> am.cmd('open', 'iwin', 'm$jmap', ctr)   # m$jmap is the map name in JavaScript # ... then open in browser for best performance

title: Thin Wrapper for Mapping Library AMap by AutoNavi
text: Run command demo(.shiny, 'amapro'). Demo open default browser. Made amapro. Powered AMap.

title: Introduction — -- Introduction --
text: Essential information, tips tricks

title: Introduction — -- Introduction --
text: Welcoming JavaScript library AMap world R. AMap advanced mapping library made China widely used . features 2D/3D animation, supports multitude layers markers, data import, flyover playback, etc.  Library amapro let control AMap R Shiny. uses AMap’s native commands/parameters wrapped just commands.

title: Introduction — -- Introduction --
text: AMap’s documentation Chinese links make reference . happen know Chinese, convenient set browser auto-translate. help little lot depending website/page structure. One can also copy/paste text Google translate.

title: Introduction — -- Introduction --
text: Install amapro Github remotes::install_github("helgasoft/amapro") CRAN version also available usually outdated. Run following commands library(amapro); .init()  pop-dialog ask API key (shows , repeated).  API key obtained registration, expecting provide Chinese phone number SMS verification.  get API key reside China? ask friend China help, hire local freelancer search web shared key use temporary Chinese phone number sites like sms24., turtle-sms.xyz, etc. However probably blacklisted registration page shows ‘already registered’. select temporarily ‘demo’ option, without guarantee work long run

text: Interactive, hands-showcase many library features. Activate following command: library(amapro); demo(.shiny)

text: AMap extension enhanced 3D features. amapro invoked parameter - .init(loca=TRUE, ...). documentation auto-translates well browser. Intro API documentation

title: Introduction — -- Introduction --
text: Controlling map elements done sending AMap commands . Commands can chained pipe operator |> %>% executed sequentially order received.  Example: .cmd('setAngle', 'carIcon', -90) amapro uses native AMap commands introduces additional: set - create new element name: add new global JS object outside map .cmd('set', 'VectorLayer', name='e$layer1') without name: add new element map .cmd('set', 'e$marker1', position= c(116.478, 39.998)) addTo - append one existing JS object another name .cmd('addTo', 'e$layer1', 'e$marker1') var - set JavaScript variable .cmd('var', 'e$myOpacity', 0.8) code - execute JavaScript code .cmd('code', 'alert("JS");') AMap commands starting get return data map related objects.  Put data Shiny input variable setting name parameter r.  Example: .cmd('getCenter', 'map', r='inShiny1')  command update input$inShiny1 Lng/Lat coordinates map center.

title: Introduction — -- Introduction --
text: Events defined map elements. types instances use /methods bind remove events.  Events set attribute () list lists. event separate list event name e, JS function f optionally query q. Example:   /events without name ignored, except map (example).  JavaScript function Shiny.setInputValue() can used send data back Shiny.
code: am.init(center= c(116.475, 39.997), zoom= 17,         on= list(list(e= 'complete',                        f= "function() {alert('loaded!');}")) )

title: Introduction — -- Introduction --
text: one map created .init per session. JS global called ‘m$jmap’. AMap command addTo overwritten amapro used. supported AMap plugins : ControlBar, Scale, ToolBar, MoveAnimation, MouseTool, HeatMap, GeoJSON, ElasticMarker. built-AMap tile layers (Satellite, Traffic, Roads) limited China . However, command .item(‘TileLayer’), one can use Leaflet provider worldwide coverage. AMap built-map layers GCJ-02 coded coordinates collected display incorrectly Leaflet WGS-84 based maps, vice-versa. need converted. Conversion available function convertFrom. AMap ecosystem vast, unsupported features include: ‘BesizerCurve’, ‘MarkerCluster’, ‘HawkEye’, IndoorMap, CustomLayer, ‘GLCustomLayer’, ‘DistrictLayer’, ‘LayerGroup’, editors like ‘PolygonEditor’,‘Webservice’, ‘Search(AMap.Autocomplete, AMap.PlaceSearch)’, ‘Geocoding(AMap.Geocoder)’, Route planning, services(weather, districts, etc.), positioning, utilities. Loca elements supported, tested. Latest AmbientLight, DirectionalLight PointLight objects supported, parameters ambLight, dirLight pointLight accomplish . Loca events supported yet. loca.js file several versions, latest (bigger) one work well current amap.js

One can install small extension Chrome Firefox fix problem manually inside browser. AMap several predefined Map styles. set map options mapStyle. amapro silent errors collected browser Console. title: Run a command — am.cmd
text: Execute command target element

title: Run a command — am.cmd
text: id map widget .init proxy .proxy cmd command name string, like 'setFitView' trgt target's name string, 'map' map . ... command attributes

title: Run a command — am.cmd
text: map map proxy

title: Run a command — am.cmd
text: .cmd provides interaction map. Commands sent map , objects inside outside . AMap built-objects predefined set commands listed API. Commands can modify object (setZoom), also get data (getCenter).amapro introduces commands like set, addTo code, described Introduction.

title: Add Control — am.control
text: Add Control map.

title: Add Control — am.control
text: id amapro id widget .init ctype string name control, like 'Scale','ControlBar','ToolBar'. ... named list parameters chosen control

title: Add Control — am.control
text: map widget plot, save expand features.

title: Add Control — am.control
text: controls ControlBar, ToolBar Scale. Parameters position offset.

title: Map Initialization — am.init
text: First command build map

title: Map Initialization — am.init
text: ... attributes map, see . Additional attribute loca(boolean) add Loca.Container map. width, height valid CSS unit (like '100%')

title: Map Initialization — am.init
text: widget plot, store expand features

title: Map Initialization — am.init
text: Command .init creates widget createWidget, adds features . first use, .init prompts AMap API key. temporary demo mode key unavailable.

title: Map Initialization — am.init
code: if (interactive()) {   ctr <- c(22.430151, 37.073011)   tu <- paste0('http://server.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/World_Imagery/',                    'MapServer/tile/[z]/[y]/[x]')   am.init( center= ctr, zoom= 10, pitch= 60, viewMode= '3D') |>   am.control(ctype= 'ControlBar', position= 'RT') |>   am.item('TileLayer', tileUrl= tu) |>   am.item('Marker', position= ctr,       icon= 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/9d/Ancient_Greek_helmet.png'   ) |>   am.cmd('set', 'InfoWindow', name='iwin', content='This is Sparta') |>   am.cmd('open', 'iwin', 'm$jmap', ctr)   # m$jmap is the map name in JavaScript }

title: Map to JSON — am.inspect
text: Convert map elements JSON string

title: Map to JSON — am.inspect
text: wt amapro widget returned .init json Boolean whether return JSON, list, default TRUE ... Additional arguments pass toJSON

title: Map to JSON — am.inspect
text: JSON string json TRUE list otherwise.

title: Map to JSON — am.inspect
text: Must invoked chained last command.

title: Map to JSON — am.inspect
code: if (interactive()) {   am.init(viewMode= '3D', zoom= 10, pitch= 60) |>     am.control(ctype= 'ControlBar', position= 'RT') |>     am.inspect() }

title: Add Item — am.item
text: Add item map

title: Add Item — am.item
text: id valid widget .init itype string item type name, like 'Marker' ... attributes item

title: Add Item — am.item
text: map widget plot, save expand features

title: Add Item — am.item
text: add item like Marker, Text Polyline map

title: Shiny: map UI — am.output
text: Placeholder map Shiny UI

title: Shiny: map UI — am.output
text: outputId Name output UI element. width, height Must valid CSS unit (like '100%', '400px', 'auto') number, coerced string 'px' appended.

title: Shiny: map UI — am.output
text: output render function enables use widget within Shiny applications. See shinyWidgetOutput.

text: Create proxy existing map Shiny. allows add, merge, delete elements map without reloading .
